report.title: My gardens
report.description: List of gardens registered by a user.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values v ON v.location_id=l.id AND v.deleted=false AND v.location_attribute_id=304 LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false #joins# #agreements_join# WHERE lw.website_id in (#website_ids#) AND l.deleted=false AND l.created_by_id=#created_by_id#
